thread.title: Liverpool news: Dejan Lovren misses warm weather training camp in La Manga | Metro News
thread.title_full: Liverpool news: Dejan Lovren misses warm weather training camp in La Manga | Metro News

author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Liverpool news: Dejan Lovren misses warm weather training camp in La Manga | Metro News
text:
Coral Barry for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 9:38 am Dejan Lovren is still struggling with a knee injury (Picture: Getty) 
Dejan Lovren was the most notable Liverpool star missing from the squad that traveled to La Manga alongside Jurgen Klopp. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The Liverpool defender has remained in Melwood to continue rehabilitation on the knee problem that forced him out of the last two games. 
Lovren has not played since the 1-1 draw with Chelsea and he joins three other Liverpool players who missed the trip to Spain. 
Long-term absentees Danny Ings and Adam Bogdan stayed in Melwood as did promising youngsters Ovie Ejaria and Marko Grujic. Liverpool fixtures 
Leicester (A) – Mon 27 Feb Arsenal (H) – Sat 4 Mar Burnley (H) – Sun 12 Mar Man City (A) – Sun 19 Mar Everton (H) – Sat 1 Apr Bournemouth (H) – Wed 5 Apr Jurgen Klopp and Liverpool will stay in La Manga resort (Picture: Getty) Jurgen Klopp has trained at La Manga before with Borussia Dortmund (Picture: Gety 
Klopp is hoping the warm weather training camp will rejuvenate his side that has so far endured a frustrating 2017. 
Just one win this year has derailed Liverpool’s title challenge, but a 2-0 win over Tottenham in their most recent game has raised hopes the Reds could still make top four. La Manga squad in full Goalkeepers: Karius, Mignolet, Manninger Defenders: Matip, Lucas, Klavan, Gomez, Masterson, Clyne, Milner, Moreno, Alexander-Arnold, Randall
Midfielders: Stewart, Henderson, Lallana, Wijnaldum, Can, Dhanda, Coutinho, Ojo, Wilson, Mane, Firmino 
Strikers: Sturridge, Origi, Woodburn
